items.text: another inside edge onto the pad as he looks to punch one outside off
items.shortText: Lakmal to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: full, outside off, gets to the pitch and hammers a drive straight to the covers
items.shortText: Lakmal to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: full and accurate on middle, clipped to short midwicket who makes a half-stop after getting down to his left
items.shortText: Lakmal to Anamul Haque, 1 run

items.text: short of a length, pitches outside leg and comes on around middle and leg, tucked into the legside
items.shortText: Lakmal to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short, gets under it comfortably as the ball goes over middle and leg
items.shortText: Lakmal to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: fullish length, cuts in off the deck and he gets an inside edge as he plays a half-flick
items.shortText: Pradeep to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: good running,good communication. Length ball outside off, punched between the mid-off and extra cover region, just wide of the fielder, for a quick single
items.shortText: Pradeep to Anamul Haque, 1 run

items.text: short of a length, tucks it from outside the leg stump through backward square leg
items.shortText: Pradeep to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: gets a good stride across to a length ball and punches it straight to mid-off
items.shortText: Pradeep to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of a length, angling on middle, defended
items.shortText: Pradeep to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Wasa: "I think BD missed the trick here by not being aggressive from the beginning. The key to ZIM win against SL was their positive batting right from the start. "
items.text: full, angling in towards middle and off, flicked off the pads to deep backward square leg
items.shortText: Pradeep to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short of a length on middle, drops it in front of mid-on and midwicket for a quick one
items.shortText: Lakmal to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short of a length, uses the angle to tuck through backward of square leg
items.shortText: Lakmal to Anamul Haque, 1 run

items.preText: Raiyan Ferdous: "@mahneel : couldn't agree more. Sometimes I really wonder is this the guy whom we once used to refer as walking wicket? Fantastic transformation."
items.text: fires up a low full toss outside off, Tamim quietly pushes it off the front foot in front of mid-off
items.shortText: Lakmal to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: edged and past first slip. A lovely delivery from Lakmal. In the corrodir, around the fourth-stump channel, drawing him forward with a good length and kissing the outside edge by getting it to shape away slightly. The fielder at first slip dives to his right but the ball drops just in front of the fielder and gets past him
items.shortText: Lakmal to Anamul Haque, FOUR runs

items.text: short of a length, gets an inside edge as he stays in the crease and defends
items.shortText: Lakmal to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: now he pushes away from the body and deliberately opens the face to run it down to third man
items.shortText: Lakmal to Anamul Haque, 1 run

items.text: full and shaping in, punches with the angle off the inside of the bat down the ground, towards mid-on
items.shortText: Pradeep to Anamul Haque, 1 run

items.text: short ball, gets under it as the ball goes over the middle and leg line
items.shortText: Pradeep to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: oh, shot! Beautiful stroke. Leans into a drive to a fuller delivery and crunches it between cover and mid-off. Guided with laser-like precision
items.shortText: Pradeep to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length, stands in the crease and punches to mid-on for one
items.shortText: Pradeep to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short of good length, tries to pull it away and gets hit on the high part of the bat as the ball doesn't quite come on
items.shortText: Pradeep to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: short of a length on the fourth-stump channel, stands tall and punches it
items.shortText: Pradeep to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: back of a length, turns it away from front of the stumps into the leg side
items.shortText: Lakmal to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length, pitching outside leg, nudges it away to midwicket
items.shortText: Lakmal to Tamim Iqbal, no run
